My target workspace had two windows open.  I got the same error while it was 
reopening the second window as well.  It would have been in the same call to 
Workbench.restoreState as the first one.

And again when I tried closing and reopening the Navigator in one of the 
windows.  This doesn't appear to be particularly timing-sensitive.
